articles.title: The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City Recap: Trial by Choir - Vulture
articles.description: Forget Heather’s fake choir, they should just stage this fight as a one-act play and tour it across the country. A recap of “Choir of Chaos,” episode 7 of season 3 of ‘The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City,’ RHOSLC, on Bravo and streaming on Peacock.
articles.content: This week, we pick up right where we left off, at the auditions for Heathers fake choir, where Jen has just spotted Angie Harrington in her dollar-store leotard outfit. Seeing her there feels like a … [+8630 chars]
